attributes.action: abolish age limit for claiming Bereavement Payment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present men and women above State Pension age are not entitled to Bereavement Payment when they lose their spouse. People are more likely to die in old age than in young age. They should not be denied the Bereavement Payment at a time when they are at their most vulnerable and in dire need of help. There is therefore the need to change the restrictions in this law.
